25860.現在 さいほう職人レベル<%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV>です。\n何を作ります:
Current Saiho Craftsman Level
<%dL_SYOKUNIN_LV... What do you want to make?<break>

30136.さいほうとは 素材となる布を ぬいあわせて\n目的のアイテムを 作ることです。\:
A sewing method is the process of sewing together fabric to create a desired item... The cut cloth is wove together and shaped to
follow the success line... The quality of the finished product is determined by the accuracy... To execute a command, you must be
able to concentrate... If you lose your concentration, you won't be able to do it, so pace yourself and choose your commands. The
more power you have, the more you'll be able to pull it off, but each time you pull it off, the power changes. The more power you
have, the more you'll be able to... Please note that if the game is interrupted due to a communication error during the sewing
process, all materials will be lost.

31504.かげんぬいを使うと\n半分のチカラで ぬいつけることができます。\n細かい調整を:
If you use the "limit knitting" method, you
can knit with half the force... It's useful
when you need to make small adjustments.

31506.糸ほぐしを使うと\nぬいすぎた１マスを ほぐして\nゆるめることができます。:
If you use a yarn loosener, you can loosen
one square that's been over-woven...

31512.水平ぬいを使うと\nヨコ１列を 一気にぬいつけます。:
If you use a horizontal bevel, you can bevel
a whole row at once...

31513.滝のぼりを使うと\n上下に２マス分 まとめてぬいつけます。:
If you use the waterfall climbers, you'll get
two squares up and down...

31514.玉どめを使ったマスは\nしばらくの間 何をしても\nぬいつけられなくなります。:
For a while, you couldn't wipe out a trout
with a ball stopper, no matter what you did.

31515.たすきぬいを使うと 左下から右上に向かって\nナナメに２マス分 まとめてぬいつけ:
If you use a tasuki nori, you can sew two
squares in a row from the bottom left to the
top right...

31537.２倍ぬいを使うと\nひとつのマスを ２倍の強さで ぬいつけます。\nぬいパワーと:
If you use double-striping, you can double the strength of a single square... Combine it with your sewing power and use it to your
advantage!

32994.精神統一をすると その時のぬいパワーを\n３ターンの間 持続させることができます:
When you unify your mind, your Nui power
lasts for three turns...

38994.さいほうの遊び方の説明です！\n<br>\nカットされた布を ぬいあわせて\n成:
Here's how to play it again! Wipe the cut pieces of cloth together and shape them to fit the success line... When all the squares
meet the success line, use the "finish" command to complete the game. The strength of the cloth changes each time it's sewn. The
strength of your wipe changes with each wipe, so watch out for changes in your wiping power and how much concentration you have left!

44564.一度 コツをつかんだ アイテムは\n『いっぱつしあげ』が できるようになります。:
Once you have a knack for an item, the "Quick Craft" command becomes available.
Quick Craft allows you to finish the item in no time flat! However, items created this way can never be ★★★ quality.
In addition, the chance of getting a critical hit while using "Craft Normally" has increased slightly!
